title: Monster mountains, ambush opportunities, and a tense TTT: Six stages that could explode the Vuelta a España
content:
Vingegaard, Roglič, Evenepoel set to suffer through Angliru, Tourmalet, and a whole host of horrorific stages in the race for red.

Read the full article at Monster mountains, ambush opportunities, and a tense TTT: Six stages that could explode the Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
